name: Bavarian Pilsner
description: Brewed in collaboration with our friends Beva Brewing & Blending, this beer showcases classic noble hop character and pristine clarity. Pale golden with a delicate herbal aroma, our Bavarian Pilsner delivers a clean, refreshing taste with a gentle hop finish.

name: Kol Story Bro Kolsch
description: This ale is cool fermented to create a smooth and refreshing beer with a crisp body and clean finish.

name: Slice of Paradise Yuzu Wheat Ale
description: Bringing together yuzu and coriander to create a crisp and refreshing wheat ale, perfectly balancing citrus and spice. Brewed with their friends at Steel & Oak, Slice of Paradise provides the ultimate escape to paradise.

name: Salted Lime Lager
description: A light, latin american cerveza type beer with a modern twist. This is a crisp, clean lager made with Mexican limes and world-renowned salt sourced from El Valle Salado.

name: Bohemian Rhapsody
description: An authentic, refreshing, easy-drinking Czech amber lager. Light spicy and herbal Czech Saaz hop notes is upfront. Rich toasty, bready malt from Czech floor-malted pilsner malt with a slight hint of caramelized sugar. Firm bitterness leads to clean crisp refreshing finish.

name: Cloud Nine
description: A strong pale lager that balances between rich flavour and lager drinkability. Robust grainy pilsner malt flavour with light doughy notes. Herbal hop aroma with light citrus and white grape.

name: Craft Lager
description: A light, clean lager with a hint of malt and subtle hop flavour. An iconic East Van beer. Clean, crisp and refreshing. A pale lager brewed with all malted barley and local Sterling hops grown at Sartori Cedar Ranch in Chilliwack, BC. Fermented cool using a traditional German lager yeast.

name: Craft Lager Lite
description: A “light” version of P49’s Craft Lager…Clean, light-bodied, very refreshing and thirst-quenching pale lager. Low on both malt and hop flavour but not as flavourless as the "light" beers from macro breweries

name: Craft Pilsner
description: Inspired by the traditional Czech Pilsner style,this beer is crisp and refreshing with a rich and complex bready maltiness complimented by the slightly spicy and floral hop character.

name: Decibel Tripel
description: A double-dryhopped hazy triple IPA with Citra, Nelson Sauvin, Amarillo, Centennial, and Incognito Citra. Huge hop character of kiwi, lychee, white grape, cream, passionfruit, and tangerine.(10oz,High ABV)

name: Filthy Dirty West Coast IPA
description:
A west coast IPA with a ton of hop flavour and aroma.
 Subtle sweet malt flavour backs up the huge amount of orange,
 grapefruit, pine and floral aromas this beer expels.

name: Ginja Turtles Sour
description: An easy-drinking sour ale. The refreshing aroma of lime and ginger along with the light tingling ginger spiciness. Moderately high clean sourness. Tastes like ginger limeade.

name: Golden Faucet
description: A best bitter (English pale ale) brewed to showcase our favorite English malt, Golden Promise from Thomas Fawcett & Sons. Crackery and grainy, light yet rich flavourful malt from the Golden Promise. Delicate candy-like mouthfeel from invert sugar from UK. Floral, minty, spicy, and hint of orange marmalade characters from Styrian Celeia, East Kent Goldings, and Fuggles hops. Firm bitterness. A hint of apricot and dark dried fruits from an ale yeast strain from West Yorkshire.

name: Hop PaTroll Sluggo West Coast IPA
description: A good classic West Coast IPA dryhopped with El Dorado, Simcoe, and Amarillo. Strong hop aroma of paneapple, mango, apricot, pine, dank, and citrus.

name: Limitless GF Lager
description: A gluten-free lager brewed without using gluten-containing ingredients. Delicate herbal and spicy German Perle hop character.

name: N2 Craft Stout
description: A dry Caribbean style stout with rich coffee and chocolate notes. Beautiful cascade and smooth velvety mouthfeel from the nitro.

name: New Frontier
description: A collaboration brew with a 100% grower-owned hop supplier, Yakima Chief Hops. Intense but clean hop flavour and aroma of pineapple, pine, currant, and grapefruit. Clean moderately high bitterness.

name: Old Boy Classic Ale
description: Rich malt flavours of caramel, toffee and light chocolate. This ale is an ode to the pub beers of England. Well balanced flavours of malts and hops make this beer a classic.

name: Pink Power Sour
description: Vibrant and empowering Tropical Hibiscus POG(passionfruit, orange, guava).

name: Space Kitty
description: Hoppy, sessionable juicy IPA. Hop aroma of pineappple, mango, peach, pear, and lime from Mosaic, Amarillo and Citra Cryo dryhop. Light crisp grainy malt flavour. Light ceamy mouthfeel from oats and wheat. Quite hazy but not too thick. Great combination of juicy, hoppy, and sessionable.

name: The Red Light Sting
description:
A dry, easy-drinking red IPA. Hop characters of lime, pine, kiwi, gooseberry, and spice. Kight grainy malt with a hint of bread, raisin, and roast complexity. Moderate bitterness with dry finish with evergreen aftertaste.
P49 Root Beer Soda - 50 L Keg	20	A non-alcoholic root

name: Trash Panda Northeast Hazy IPA
description: Trash Panda uses huge amounts of dry hopping, giving this beer complex notes of melon, tropical fruit and pear. Its hop and malt varieties leave a visible haziness and smooth, juicy mouth feel.

name: Tricycle Grapefruit Radler
description: A classic German summer thirst-quenching mix of Bavarian lager and fresh grapefruit juice.

name: What's the Craic?
description: An easy-drinking Irish Red Ale with a nuanced malt profile. A delightful grainy sweetness, toasted bread, and delicate toffee notes from the malts. A touch of roasted barley contributes a dry finish, while subtle fruit esters enhance its complexity. Medium bitterness provides a satisfying balance.

name: The Dark Crystal Dark Ale
description: A dark fantasy.. A cult following.. A intersection of toasted oats, melted caramel and chocolate wrath.. A dazzling achievement in the dark arts of malt-forawrd beer.

name: Idleback Amber Ale
description: This amber ale combines the best ingredients that Europe and North America have to offer. Belgian crystal malts provide notes of dark fruit and raisins and Cascade hops provide a slight bitterness and a hint of fresh pine.

name: Party Wave Hazy
description: Hazy, pillowy soft body of Pilsner malt, wheat and oats, wrapped in heavy late and dry-hop additions of Mosaic & Amarillo

name: House Hazy IPA
description: St Augustines Hazy IPA

name: House Lager
description: Bavarian-style craft lager by Parallel 49.

name: House Pale Ale
description: A true balance of malt and hops that showcase the bready,caramel flavours of malted barley and the citrus, stone-fruit aromas of hops grown in the Pacific Northwest. Refreshingly drinkable and full of flavour.

name: Flagship IPA
description: Intense fruit aroma, finishing with a balanced bitterness.

name: Heroica Red Ale
description: This robust red ale has beautiful citrus and pine notes that come from generous additions of Centennial, Citra & Simcoe hops. It is smooth & velvety in the mouth with toasted malts providing a medium body with hints of roasted hazelnut, toffee & caramel malt flavours.

name: Nitro Stout
description: This beer pours a cascading jet black with a signature tan  head. Aromas of coffee and dark chocolate give way to a  perfectly smooth and creamy mouthfeel

name: Raspberry Tangerine Gummy Sour
description: Inspired by trips to the 5 cent candy aisle, Gummy Sour is an explosion of flavour. Perfectly sweet with a pleasant acidity, these fruit sours are designed to satisfy our candy cravings.

name: Colour & Shape
description: This is the kind of IPA we dream about. Unfiltered so nothing of the greatness gets lost. It is soft, with lots of tropical fruit notes and a touch of herbal quality. Incredibly drinkable and super delicious.

name: Motel Pale Ale
description: This 5-hop Pale Ale is a hop-forward hazy Pale with heaps of tropical & berry notes that provide a crisp & balanced offering. Hints of lemon rind w/ this unique combination of hops provide a lingering citrus, hoppy & dry finish perfect for your next trip Parkside… or wherever else you may end up for the night.

name: Tipsy Twig Dry Cider
description: Tipsy Twig in house-fermented dry cider. Clean fresh apple aroma and flavour. Hint of honey & cinnamon. Dry and refreshing.
